item.title: Makeing admins and mods
item.dc:creator: @x_x_x_x2 x x x x2
item.description:
@x_x_x_x2 wrote:

When I do all the steps every 1 says like

[code]//start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Jimbi”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Jimbi”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}[/code]

[code][ACCOUNT]
character-username = Jimbi
character-password =

[CHARACTER]
character-height = 0
character-posx = 3254
character-posy = 3420
character-rights = 0
character-ismember = 1
character-messages = 0
character-lastconnection = localhost
character-lastlogin = 20060920
character-energy = 100
character-gametime = 0
character-gamecount = 300[/code]

Even when i change player rights to 3 it changes back to 0 any help?

Read full topic
